string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Get to learn about our faculty
You deserve every Fun-beat you can get! do Enjoy Your-self
For Previous, Current and upcomming Events

string-array.name: Comms
string-array.item: Distinguish between facts, assumptions, and opinions
Respond appropriately in a clear and concise fashion (oral and written)
Web pages on spelling, listening, jargon and gobbledygook. Booher:
Chap. 4, "Aim to Get Attention for Your Own E-mail" and \n Chap. 5: Guffey: "Writing Process Phase 1: Analyze, Anticipate, Adapt." \n Chap. 8, "Counterproductive Communication Habits.”
